title: The Week of Valor: The Adventures of Frank Hughes
summary: Frank Hughes, a 76-year-old mentor, discovers his superpowers throughout a week, using them to inspire and protect his community.
summaryGerman: Frank Hughes, ein 76-jähriger Mentor, entdeckt im Laufe einer Woche seine Superkräfte und setzt sie ein, um seine Gemeinschaft zu inspirieren und zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Frank Hughes, een 76-jarige mentor, ontdekt zijn superkrachten gedurende een week en gebruikt ze om zijn gemeenschap te inspireren en te beschermen.
summaryFrench: Frank Hughes, un mentor de 76 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs tout au long d'une semaine, les utilisant pour inspirer et protéger sa communauté.

story.text: Frank Hughes starts his week normally with a mentoring session. During the session, a sudden burst of energy allows him to sense that one of his mentees is in trouble.
Frank uses his newfound sensory powers to locate his mentee, trapped in a collapsed building. He directs emergency services to the spot, saving the young man's life.
Invigorated by his heroic deed, Frank feels a surge of responsibility and decides to undertake nightly patrols in his neighborhood.
While patrolling, Frank encounters a robbery in progress. Using his experience and quick thinking, he helps apprehend the culprits, gaining respect from the locality.
Taking a break from the excitement, Frank spends his day recounting tales of his unexpected heroism to his mentees, emphasizing the importance of quick thinking and bravery.
Frank deliberates on how to use his powers for ongoing good, consulting friends and allies on the potential ways to further benefit his community.
To hone his abilities, Frank concentrates on enhancing his sensory skills through various types of training, preparing for whatever challenges might come next.

ending: And so, Frank Hughes, once a simple mentor, now stands as a beacon of vigilance and virtue in his community.
moral: No matter the age, one can always become a hero and inspire others.
